sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A wooden board is cut into an equilateral triangle to make a shelf. If the length of one side of the triangle is 24 cm, what is the length of each side of the triangle?
message_2: Since it is an equilateral triangle, all sides are equal in length. Therefore, the length of each side of the triangle is 24 cm.
